text: Maika Angela Ortiz is a Filipino volleyball athlete player of the Foton Tornadoes Volleyball Team in the PSL. She is currently a member of the Philippines women's national volleyball team. ==Career== Ortiz played for the UST Golden Tigresses on her college years. She won the Best Attacker award in the UAAP Season 74 volleyball tournaments. She played for the Philippine Air Force Volleyball Team in the Shakey's V-League. She currently plays for the Foton Tornadoes in the Philippine Super Liga. ==Awards== ===Individual=== * UAAP Season 74 "Best Attacker" * Shakey's V-League 10th Season First Conference "Best Blocker" * Shakey's V-League 11th Season Open Conference "Best Blocker" * 2016 PSL Grand Prix Conference "2nd Best Middle Blocker" ===Team=== * 2014 POC-PSC Philippine National Games Women's Volleyball – Image:Med 1.png Champions, with Philippine Air Force Lady Jet Spikers * 2016 PSL All-Filipino Conference – Image:Med 2.png Silver medal, with Foton Tornadoes * 2016 PSL Grand Prix Conference – Image:Med 1.png Champions, with Foton Tornadoes * 2017 PSL Invitational Cup – Image:Med 3.png Bronze medal, with Foton Tornadoes * 2017 PSL Grand Prix Conference – Image:Med 3.png Bronze medal, with Foton Tornadoes * 2018 PSL Grand Prix Conference – Image:Med 3.png Bronze medal, with Foton Tornadoes ==References== Category:Living people Category:Filipino women's volleyball players Category:1991 births Category:University Athletic Association of the Philippines volleyball players Category:University of Santo Tomas alumni Category:Middle blockers Category:Philippines women's international volleyball players Category:Competitors at the 2017 Southeast Asian Games Category:Volleyball players at the 2018 Asian Games
title: Maika Ortiz
